forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a high near 24. North wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Wind chill values as low as 0. Northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Boston unfolds under a solid blanket of clouds, offering a sense of muted tranquility yet hinting at the briskness that defines this time of year. As the day approaches its zenith, temperatures hover around a biting 24 degrees, while gusts of wind sweep across the landscape, adding a sharpness that might stir even the most steadfast among us. The north winds whistle in at 12 to 15 mph, occasionally unleashing bursts of up to 29 miles per hour, reminding us to brace against the chill as the wind chill descends to near-zero levels tonight.

As shadows lengthen with the setting sun, temperatures will slip down to a more somber 10 degrees, coaxing forth an early evening defined by a chilly embrace. Dressing warmly is paramount today; a good, insulated coat, a cozy scarf, and sturdy gloves will make navigating the day’s errands much more pleasant. The sight beyond the window offers a tranquil view albeit hazy; the horizon is softened by clouds, painting the skyline in muted grays and whites. For those willing to venture outside, a brisk walk in the nearby parks could do wonders, the bite of the cold invigorating the senses and stirring contemplation, a genuine delight amid the wintry chill.
